volunteer.title: Developer @ Nerdery Overnight Web Challenge
volunteer.description: Building a team to develop a website for a non-profit organization within a 24 hour period. Was responsible for all JavaScript based animations and interactions on the frontend as well as WordPress configuration on the backend.

volunteer.title: Developer @ Nerdery Overnight Web Challenge
volunteer.description: Building a team to develop a website for a non-profit organization within a 24 hour period. Was responsible for setting up custom post types for the WordPress architecture as well as the underlying JavaScript framework integrated via RequireJS

volunteer.title: Speaker @ Prime Digital Academy
volunteer.description: Guest speaker for various cohorts at Prime Digital Academy. Spoke about working as a remote developer, communication techniques, etiquette, self-discipline, and keeping yourself active in the community.

volunteer.title: Mentor @ Prime Digital Academy
volunteer.description: Mentored individual students from various school cohorts as they went through their training bootcamp. Was available for questions, homework assistance, and general mentorship responsibilities.
